blocks.name: DoReload
blocks.comment: Reload the temporary app & wait for the reload to complete.

blocks.name: createApp
blocks.comment: Create a temporary 'script validator' app in the same space as the target app. Make sure to create this app in the same space as the target app.

inputs.value: Temporary script validator app [Will be deleted]
This app is used temporary to validate a load script

blocks.name: getFileContent
blocks.comment: Get the content of the first file in the pull request. Use the Lookup Item In List block if your request can contain multiple files.

blocks.name: addPullRequestReview
blocks.comment: Comment on pull request that the load script test has succeeded.

blocks.name: addPullRequestReview2
blocks.comment: Request changes on the pull request.

blocks.name: listPullRequestFiles
blocks.comment: List all files from the pull request.

blocks.name: condition3
blocks.comment: Did your GitHub user make this pull request? (Since you can't add comment in your own pull requests)

blocks.name: condition4
blocks.comment: Did your GitHub user make this pull request? (Since you can't request for changes to your own pull requests)

blocks.name: condition
blocks.comment:
Was a new pull request opened?
Tip: You can change the condition to use other actions from the pull request (like 'synchronize'). Or use the 'Add condition' option for multiple actions.

blocks.name: stop
blocks.comment: Stop automation because the pull request was not opened.

blocks.name: getAccountInfo
blocks.comment: Use this block to get the current user of the GitHub account to decide whether this user can review the pull requests since you can't review your own pull requests

blocks.name: setLoadScript
blocks.displayName: Qlik Cloud Services - Set Load Script
blocks.comment: Set the load script on the temporary app.
